title: Good Design Good
description: A series of rebrands and redesigns illustrating how Good Design do good.
richtext:
<font color="#4D4E4C">

This collection includes an array of causes i feel passionate about. The goal of these designs is to generate awareness, encourage involvement, and spark change in our communities.

</font>

![National Alliance on Mental Illness](/images/nami_interface_ndenton.jpg "National Alliance on Mental Illness")

![Alzheimer's Association](/images/alzheimers_design_ndenton.jpg "Alzheimer's Association")

![Black Lives Matter](/images/blm_interface_ndenton.jpg "Black Lives Matter")

![350](/images/350_interface_ndenton.jpg "350")

![World Animal Protection](/images/wap_interface_ndenton.jpg "World Animal Protection")
